features.feat_1_description: Control your delivery experiences in real-time through an open conversation with your delivery company.
features.feat_2_description: Access 80% of fast-food restaurants in the Kingdom at your fingertips. Enjoy the convenience of quick satisfaction as we offer you countless fast-food options.
features.feat_3_description: Experience secure transaction confidence. Our platform prioritizes the safety of your financial interactions, utilizing the latest security measures to protect your payments.

hero.title: More than 20,000 restaurants. Order and your meal will be delivered to your doorstep.
